channel.title: [PI] Minigame Entrance Requirements
channel.description: What would the method be? I have it set to require a pickaxe but I dont know what the method would be to require the gloves and boots.

item.title: [PI] Minigame Entrance Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Epik Sir Epik
item.description:
@Sir_Epik wrote:

For messages;if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == PICKAXE) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerHands] == GLOVES) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerFeet] == BOOTS) { // TODO: Method? } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be wearing " + c.getItems().getItemName(BOOTS) + "."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be wearing " + c.getItems().getItemName(GLOVES) + "."); return; } } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be wearing " + c.getItems().getItemName(PICKAXE) + "."); return; }
For simplicity;if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == PICKAXE && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHands] == GLOVES && c.playerEquipment[c.playerFeet] == BOOTS) { // TODO: Method? } else { c.sendMessage("You need to be wearing " + c.getItems().getItemName(BOOTS) + ", " + c.getItems().getItemName(GLOVES) + ", and a " + c.getItems().getItemName(PICKAXE) + "."); return; }

Read full topic
